text: Luke worked .Indiana Jones ate chilled monkey brain .Tom waited for us .The verb worked / work is intransitive and thus subcategorizes for a single argument ( here Luke ) , which is the subject ; therefore its subcategorization frame contains just a subject argument .
label: Motivation
